snippet: An early-morning fire raced through the top of the historic Main Building in Brooklyn, causing significant damage and three minor injuries.
abstract: Fire ravages top two floors of historic Main Building at Pratt Institute in Brooklyn, destroying dozens of art studios and irreplaceable artworks by students; cause of fire is under investigation; Main Building is part of a complex that has been designated a New York City landmark as well as a national treasure.

byline.original: By JOSEPH BERGER and NATE SCHWEBER

lead_paragraph: An early-morning fire raced through the top of the historic Main Building in Brooklyn, causing significant damage and three minor injuries.

headline.seo: Pratt Institute’s Main Building Damaged by Fire
headline.main: Fire at Pratt Institute Destroys Studios and Artwork of Students
headline.print_headline: Fire at Pratt Institute Destroys Studios and Artwork of Students
